q: what is the relationship between people on motorboats and people surfing
pred: The relationship between the people on the motorboats and the people surfing is that they are all enjoying their time on the water. The people on the motorboats are watching the surfers and possibly taking pictures or videos of them. The surfers are riding the waves and having a good time. The presence of both groups on the water suggests that they are sharing the experience and enjoying the water activities together.
